Kohei Obata / 小幡紘平 | PhD candidate at Osaka University

Research

My research interests:

  • Data mining
  • Time series analysis
  • Anomaly detection

Specific interests:

  • Interpretable subsequence clustering for tensor time series
  • Missing value imputation leveraging network inference
  • Contrastive learning for tensor time series
  • Diffusion model
  • Data augmentation for time series anomaly detection
